attributes.action: Allow Mr Pun VC to be allowed in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A war hero has been denied the right to live in this country, when there are thousands of people landing on our shores all the time.

He risked his life in WWII and was awarded a VC.

Let him reside here, he deserves it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
